record.id: field.name="allowed.cats" and file.name="ocmprofile" and term=NULL and format.name=NULL and syslanguage="en"
record.field.name: allowed.cats
record.file.name: ocmprofile

brief.brief: The categories members of this profile may access, if you want to limit them.
If you do not specify specific categories, members of this profile have access to all Categories for that area.
This field controls the Categories displayed for the operator to select from during record open, if there is no defined Dflt Category, and it controls the records the operator can view.
If an operator attempts to select a record that is not one of these Categories, Service Manager denies access and sends an error message.
